attributes.action: Ask the National Health Service to keep Local Doctors Surgeries across the United Kingdom.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If we should keep local Doctors Surgeries across the United Kingdom please sign this petition

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
